name: Mr. Woo
description:
Play as Mr. Woo...

The owls are coming!

One budgie has made it their mission to protect their home from the incoming invasion of OWLS...
Featuring over 8 locations where eggs can spawn on a loosely calculated timer!
Race against your metabolism to bring the eggs safely home to the nest.
After years under enemy fire, boulders begin to make the game artificially harder.
This budgie has had enough, it's been working out and it's now strong enough to throw birdseed at such a speed, that can explode owls and crumble boulders.

He will never give up (apart from when you run out of lives).
